Name: HINGE VR
About the game: HINGE is a psychological horror VR adventure. You suddenly find yourself in an abandoned skyscraper, deprived of all your senses and memories. The laws of physics are broken and time isÂ collapsed. The only way to get out is to step into the frightening unknown putting all the pieces together. PUT ALL THE PIECES TOGETHER TO FIND THE TRUTH The game is set in an American metropolis of the early 20th century right after the Spanish flu epidemic. It takes place in Elwood Tower skyscraper, built by an eccentric millionaire who, according to rumor, is involved in the occult and is said to be at the center of a mysterious cult. EXPLORE ALL HIDDEN DIMENSIONS OF ELWOOD TOWER Once the skyscraper is built and finally opened, its owner runs the great ceremony and invites many different people. But on that night, something mystical happens and transfers the building with all its inhabitants into a nightmarish reality, where the laws of physics, chemistry, and space are broken and time is collapsed. UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY
